amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. The amount otherwise made available by this Act for "Department of Energy--Energy Programs--Fossil Energy Research and Development" is hereby reduced by $30,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that the amount otherwise made available for "Department of Energy--Energy Programs--Fossil Energy Research and Development" is reduced by $30 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A064) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 250 (Roll no. 342).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A064) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 250 (Roll no. 342).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A064) offered by Ms. Speier.
